data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ye, Xin-hai, van Achterberg, Cornelis, Yue, Qi, Xu, Zai-fu (2017): Review of the Chinese Leucospidae (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea). ZooKeys 651: 107-157, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.651.11235, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.651.11235
